description: A vibrant waterfront amusement park located on the last stretch of Batumi Seafront Boulevard, featuring an eclectic collection of modern sculptures, historic monuments, and entertainment attractions. Open 24/7 with free entry, it houses iconic landmarks including the Ferris wheel, historic lighthouse, Alphabet Tower, and the famous Ali and Nino kinetic sculpture.

vibe: Eclectic, festive, and wonderfully chaotic in the best way. Miracle Park feels like a celebration of Georgian creativity, blending historic monuments with quirky modern art and family entertainment. The atmosphere is simultaneously playful and culturally meaningful - where you can sip free chacha under a DNA-inspired alphabet tower while watching a tragic love story play out in moving steel. Evenings transform the park into an illuminated wonderland buzzing with locals and tourists.
